text: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
translation: 30.Nabiyow cusey koroosite mari umamaláh koo casbisoonuh, hinnay koo qidoonuh hinnay Makkak koo yayyaaqoonuh koh malsen waqdi, usun umamaláh malsaanaah, Yalli ken umamalá keenil gacsaah ken umamalal ken galtah, Yalli umamalah malissi haa marak aysuk raaqaah ken elle digaalah.
